channel.title: How i change color of texte
channel.description:
I would like to know how i change color of texte when i talk with my player on my client.
My color is already white and i want to change the color. How i change it?
Thanks.

item.title: How i change color of texte
item.dc:creator: @xx_qwertyuiop_xx xx qwertyuiop xx
item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

Ah, change the default value of the variable j2 in method73.

Read full topic
item.source: How i change color of texte

item.title: How i change color of texte
item.dc:creator: @ZYG ZYG
item.description:
@ZYG wrote:

[quote=“xx qwertyuiop xx, post:2, topic:251538”]Find a line similar to this in your Client class:

class30_sub2_sub1_sub4.method385(255, aStringArray944[k], i1, 822, j1);

The first parameter is the color. Change it to the hexidecimal color code of the color you want.[/quote]

He meant the text above your head, not in the chatbox.

Read full topic
item.source: How i change color of texte

item.title: How i change color of texte
item.dc:creator: @Maximum_ZxZ Maximum ZxZ
item.description:
@Maximum_ZxZ wrote:

But what is the code of each color?

item.source: How i change color of texte

item.title: How i change color of texte
item.dc:creator: @xx_qwertyuiop_xx xx qwertyuiop xx
item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

Find a line similar to this in your Client class:

class30_sub2_sub1_sub4.method385(255, aStringArray944[k], i1, 822, j1);

The first parameter is the color. Change it to the hexidecimal color code of the color you want.

Read full topic
